Large Quiver of Arrows.name: Large Quiver of Arrows
Large Quiver of Arrows.description: A large quiver of arrows, required to use bows of all kinds. Is automatically refilled after each battle if you have enough ammunition.

Large Quiver of Bolts.name: Large Quiver of Bolts
Large Quiver of Bolts.description: A large quiver of bolts, required to use crossbows. Is automatically refilled after each battle if you have enough ammunition.

Quiver of Arrows.name: Quiver of Arrows
Quiver of Arrows.description: A quiver of arrows, required to use bows of all kinds. Is automatically refilled after each battle if you have enough ammunition.
